title: Strategies for Overcoming Digital Transformation Barriers in Legal Firms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Legal Work Processes and Organizational Management
context.additional_context: Learners are legal firm administrators or related professionals who require practical understanding of digital transformation barriers and solutions

learning_goals: Analyze at least three structural and cultural barriers occurring during a law firm’s digital transformation
Design a digital strategy framework for a law firm based on case studies and interview data
It can explain industry-specific differences by comparing digital transformation cases of a law firm and an architectural firm.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
